history.proof: intros A l l' H. induction H. - apply nil_is_permutation. - srun best use: head_insertion, permutation_insertion.

exceptions.exn: The reference l0 was not found in the current environment.
The reference IHinsertion was not found in the current environment.

original: intros A l l' H. induction H. - apply nil_is_permutation. - apply permutation_insertion with (x:=x) (l2:=l0) (l3:=l'). + apply IHinsertion. + apply tail_insertion. apply Permutation_sym. apply Permutation_cons_inv in H. apply Permutation_sym. apply H.
